title: @Riot - No One Used a Skin Boost But....
body:
This still happened and it's not the first time it's happened when I've been in an ARAM lobby. I don't own Runeborn Xerath and no one used a Skin Boost as far as I know when I read over the chat.

https://gyazo.com/5fc1d1ce9ddb52242469de3cb1ce635c

replies.body: It does look like someone must have used a skin boost in that match, since the chat log shows Runeborn Xerath being unlocked from the boost.

I guess my chat must have cut off or something. Thank for the assistance though, Broporo. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Always a pleasure. Keep on keepin' on my dude!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
